title: Creating a community
body:
Hello so i'm going to get straight to the point by saying i have created a TeamSpeak3 for the purpose of letting everyone join and allow you and your team mates a place to talk, i can create you your own channel with a  password just let me know

TeamSpeak3 IP: 0bscure.streamlinegames.com
Contact Chips for your own channel

replies.body: Awsome community, very nice people go check them out :) :)
